name: Who knows the truth?
description:
This is our first game jam submission. The game jam was Weekly Game Jam Week 150, and we had one week to create a game. All the sounds and art were made by us.
Note: The game could contain scary scenes.

Controls: WASD-move

                      F-flashlight

                      E-interact with items

What programs did we use?

Ue4, Blender & Garage Band

The main character of the game wants to steal from an old house, but when he gets there he finds out that there is a ghost watching the house. What's the real story? Nobody knows...
